t: Signing in
s: April 15, 2018 - Brendan Gramer says "Amazon" in American Sign LanguagePhoto by JORDAN STEAD / Amazon · Gramer has been deaf since birth, born to a hearing family outside of Chicago. His parents decided to raise him orally, meaning that he would learn to speak and read lips rather than sign language.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
